attributes.action: extend the protection afforded to National Parks to all AONBs in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the alarming projections for population growth in the UK and the increasing pressure on relatively unspoiled countryside, I believe we should take the opportunity to raise all Areas of Outstanding Natural Beauty to National Park status. Furthermore the new status should automatically extend to the entire area of every existing AONB, and not be subject to exclusions, as are currently being suggested for the South Downs.
